feed.title: QuickCheckout
feed.subtitle: QuickCheckout - Experience Online shopping from your neighbourhood store. QuickCheckout helps in e-retailing for the local kirana, supermarkets, homepreneurs.

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP

Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both two-digit numbers, and MARKUP is the file extension representing the format used in the file. After that, include the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

entry.title: How it Works!
entry.content:
Its way too simple. All you do is to select your store, add products to your basket and checkout.

Products get delivered to your doorstep by your neighbourhood store.
entry.summary: Its way too simple. All you do is to select your store, add products to your basket and checkout. Products get delivered to your doorstep by your neighbourhood store.

entry.title: More…
entry.content:
Know the Order Status
You get notified when your order status changes

Say More
Inform about any special requirements like specifics about your order/timings etc.

Payment at Ease
You pay the delivery executive by cash, card or digital.
entry.summary: Know the Order Status You get notified when your order status changes Say More Inform about any special requirements like specifics about your order/timings etc. Payment at Ease You pay the delivery executive by cash, card or digital.

entry.title: Promotion/Offers
entry.content:
You need not search too. They show up by default.
Easily showup current promotional items and Offers
entry.summary: You need not search too. They show up by default. Easily showup current promotional items and Offers

entry.title: Think Global, Support Local
entry.content:
Shop at your home comfort, get it delivered from your neighbourhood store..


Groceries and more, delivered to your door
entry.summary: Shop at your home comfort, get it delivered from your neighbourhood store.. Groceries and more, delivered to your door

entry.title: Google Web Fonts andFont Awesome Icons

link.title: Google Web Fonts andFont Awesome Icons

entry.content: This template features the ‘Lato’ font, part of the Google Web Font library, as well as icons from Font Awesome.
entry.summary: This template features the ‘Lato’ font, part of the Google Web Font library, as well as icons from Font Awesome.

entry.title: Online | In-Store
entry.content: Apart from Online shopping, when you visit your favourite store, use Quickcheckout to scan items and add to your e-basket. It’s a continuation of your online shopping experience!
entry.summary: Apart from Online shopping, when you visit your favourite store, use Quickcheckout to scan items and add to your e-basket. It’s a continuation of your online shopping experience!

entry.title: Same App, Many Stores
entry.content: Enjoy shopping from multiple stores from your neighbourhood with single app!
entry.summary: Enjoy shopping from multiple stores from your neighbourhood with single app!

entry.title: 3D Device Mockupsby PSDCovers
entry.content: Turn your 2D designs into high quality, 3D product shots in seconds using free Photoshop actions by PSDCovers! Visit their website to download some of their awesome, free photoshop actions!

entry.title: Quick Deliveries
entry.content:
Local stores deliver faster, period. No more delivery slots and waiting for your order.

You could opt for “store pick up” if you happen to, say, come by store while back from office
entry.summary: Local stores deliver faster, period. No more delivery slots and waiting for your order. You could opt for “store pick up” if you happen to, say, come by store while back from office
